attributes.action: Change the British National Anthem with the DrugDealer CheerLeader song 'Britains Great'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe the current National Anthem is dated and old. It doesnt make us stand up and be proud of being a nation. Therefore, we petition the National Anthem should be replaced with DrugDealer CheerLeaders amthatic song 'Britains Great'. This will rouse the British public into being a proud nation once more.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
